title: You'll soon get the hang of it
brief_description: Aims to impart the basic psychology of training and motivation and how to apply it when passing on knowledge and skills to a trainee. John Cleese uses a variety of situations - manual, clerical and technical - to put over the essential points and illustrate the major pitfalls.
